description: Structured information on a file repository.
label: File repository
name: FileRepository

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/IRI._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to this file repository.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/IRI.description: Stands for Internationalized Resource Identifier which is an internet protocol standard that builds on the URI protocol, extending the set of permitted characters to include Unicode/ISO 10646.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/IRI.label: Iri
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/IRI.name: IRI

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/content._instruction: Add all content type patterns that identify matching content types for files within this file repository.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/content.label: Content type pattern
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/content.name: contentTypePattern

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/format._instruction: If the files and file bundles within this repository are organised and formatted according to a formal data structure, add the content type of this formal data structure. Leave blank if no formal data structure has been applied.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/format.description: Method of digitally organizing and structuring data or information.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/format.label: Format
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/format.name: format

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hash._instruction: Add the hash that was generated for this file repository.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hash.description: Term used for the process of converting any data into a single value. Often also directly refers to the resulting single value.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hash.label: Hash
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hash.name: hash

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hostedB._instruction: Add the host organization of this file repository.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hostedB.description: Reference to an organization that provides facilities and services for something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hostedB.label: Hosted by
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hostedB.name: hostedBy

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name._instruction: Enter the name of this file repository.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.label: Name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.name: name

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/storage._instruction: Enter the storage size of this file repository.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/storage.description: Quantitative value defining how much disk space is used by an object on a computer system.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/storage.label: Storage size
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/storage.name: storageSize

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/structu._instruction: Add the file repository structure that identifies the file path patterns used in this file repository.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/structu.label: Structure pattern
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/structu.name: structurePattern

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type._instruction: Add the type of this file repository.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.description: Distinct class to which a group of entities or concepts with similar characteristics or attributes belong to.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.label: Type
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.name: type
